website_summaries.verdict: Affordability and durability make this buoy a good option for small watercraft.
pros: Smaller buoy size makes it easy to inflate and deflate this buoy as needed
Buoy deflates down flat for storing in small spaces
Uses a standard air pump for inflation
cons: Inflating the buoy may take longer using hand-powered pumps than electric pumps

customer_reviews.title: Pitbull Tuff & Still Unpunctured!
customer_reviews.text: Pit Bull Tuff. Purchased this and a bike inner tube as a toy for our pitbull hoping it would last longer than a minute before being punctured. Gordon has chewed, tackled, tossed, and pounced on this Taylor made watercraft pickup buoy for the past two hours and it still has not punctured! This in incredibly tuff!!
customer_reviews.author: My Dog and Me

customer_reviews.title: Good Ball Bumper
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, lightweight bumper that can be easily deployed when pulling up to a gas dock. It is small enough that it stores nicely on my 20ft. Center console. This bumper comes in larger sizes, but given it's round shape, it may take up more storage space than other shaped bumpers. Add a star, if this style bumper meets your specific needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom-TVR70

customer_reviews.title: Small buoy is it buoyant enough
customer_reviews.text: I had planned to use this floating buoy for a weighted line in an offshore application
customer_reviews.author: Wolfhound Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The buoy arrived before anticipated! Excellent quality and price. Extremely fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: khogue9069

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas. Absolutely love it. Very vibrant. Still uses it to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Lambert

customer_reviews.title: very well made durable
customer_reviews.text: great color orange, and made with durable materials should last along time
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wood

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Probably my error, but they were smaller than I realized. Hit and miss. I ordered 4. 1 had a slow leak, but was an easy repair.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jermyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well made, thick material
customer_reviews.text: We use this to place an anchor bouy off the dock so we can leave the boats rigged during the day and use them off and on. It makes it very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was just as advertised, I just didn't realize how big it would be - I can still use it on my big boat, but I was looking for a tiny buoy for a float rope. I found one of those, but this is just what it should be. I thought it would be 8 inches around and it says 8 inches in diameter, which it is.
customer_reviews.author: vgreen

customer_reviews.title: Really like these marker bouys
customer_reviews.text: Really like these marker bouys, love the price. Bought two to mark the augars fir our waverunners, and just bought another to upgrade the boat augar. Solid construction, rocket red is high vis from quite a distance. Was concerned they'd be too small, but they're perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: QASE

customer_reviews.title: good float
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a float for the Anchor line and it is visible so when we drop the anchor line and want to come back to it later it is real easy. Good color and flotation.
customer_reviews.author: Tim m Savage

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty marker. I use it to mark my jetski mooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: under inflated and would not hold air. Prime saved ...
customer_reviews.text: under inflated and would not hold air. Prime saved the day. It was returned and another one ordered. I will change the rating if the new one arrives and is fully inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette K

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Ball came deflated, I inserted a needle in it to pump up and the entire black filler pushed into the ball rendering it useless. Because I just tried it this weekend I was passed the return window so it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hann

customer_reviews.title: Works great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: We use it as an anchor buoy. Works great for that purpose! Has stood up well to salt water...still looks just as red as the day we bought and it provides other boats a good visual of where we're anchored at the sandbar. Solid product, great quality. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KwidLi

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I was expecting. Had to use for other idea than what originally intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis leudenburg

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my Sea Doo to show where the front and rear moorings are. One had less air than the other, but pumped it up a little. Happy with them. I like the color, they show up real good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: Great price, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Bright, well made and way cheaper than what you'll find it for in the stores. Highly recommended. I'm using this as an anchor buoy.. I can see it from far away and it's lasted a few seasons so far.
customer_reviews.author: sedels

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a toy for one of our young ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a toy for one of our young horses. I had previously purchased another much more expensive "horse" ball and it was destroyed quickly. This has lasted even through rough use.
customer_reviews.author: karen lockhart

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine seems to be pretty durable, will see as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great, nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Use it on a surface traverse line on scuba trips to the wreck. Works great, nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Keys Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great size Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We use these to attach to our anchors when we're out swimming so everybody knows where the anchors are. They're the perfect size and very bright and easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: bakin'mama

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but shoudl be easier to blow up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid buoy at a nice price point. My only beef is its a bit odd to try and inflate it fully. Otherwise its ok.
customer_reviews.author: MikeY

customer_reviews.title: nice little float
customer_reviews.text: nice little float. works great for my use (floating drain in lake). My dog also likes it, tries to retrieve it, can't quite get a bite on it!
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Requiring a written comment on a rubber ball is a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Float floats!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I use mine as a float for a boat tie down. Held its color well through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: James Odle

customer_reviews.title: It's nice. Feels durable and floats
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Feels durable and floats. Not much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: ocenforcer29

customer_reviews.title: Not BRIGHT orange
customer_reviews.text: These are a lighter shade of orange then the studio photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L .Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable smaller Bouy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for an anchor bouy. Thanks! Quick shipping, durable... visible... all the key points are there. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene

customer_reviews.title: Nice for anchor line ball.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my anchor line. Rode slides up and down in the loop. Works good. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard.

customer_reviews.title: Great small bouy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an anchor bouy, can be seen by all the boats nearby so they don't run over my anchor line. Plus I can pull the anchor up easier. Taylor has a great warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a very well made product. No more tripping on anchors or waving other boats away from my anchor line.
customer_reviews.author: jbt21479

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: As intended, and what I expected, deliver was as promised Works for my skis in choppy waters. Recommend to any one
customer_reviews.author: Rob D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for pond marker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with a mushroom anchor and line to place in middle of pond. This helps mark the deepest part of the pond and we often tie off a raft for floating. Will definitely buy again to add more markers for RC boat race course
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Buoy Evaluation
customer_reviews.text: After procuring this product (bouy), it makes me wish I had ordered more. My use is in a fresh water lake of good size, where the environment can and usally is severe. This product held up. A definite "thumbs up" rating for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sailer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything we thought it would be. Replaced our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Faye VanBeenen

product_meta.title: Taylor Made Products Personal Watercraft Pickup Buoy
product_meta.description: This multi-use rugged float can be used as a pick-up buoy, marker buoy, or fender. Makes a great marker for water ski events and can be used as a fender for personal water-craft. Available in white or high visibility fluorescent colors. Taylor's unique double color system incorporates a "back-up" color that resists fading. Taylor Fluorescents will retain their color long after the competition's has faded away. Buoy's measure 8" diameter with an approximate buoyancy of 8lbs.
feature_bullets: Multi-use pick up buoy, marker buoy, fender, water ski marker
Available in high visibility fluorescent colors
Rubber football needle valve for easy inflation and long life
